## phoneDesensitization() 

手机号脱敏处理

**Signature:**

```typescript
function phoneDesensitization(phnoeNum: string): string;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  phnoeNum | string | 手机号 |

**Returns:**

string

脱敏后的手机号

## Example


```ts
phoneDesensitization('18372635819') // 183****5819
```
